Title: Pursue Doctor Gero...! The Search for the Mysterious Laboratory!
Writer: Takao Koyama, Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Akira Toriyama
Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Plot: While Piccolo and company search for Dr. Gero's secret laboratory, Vegeta sets out to hunt down and destroy Android 20. Meanwhile, Trunks tries everything in his power to save his stubborn father!
